Detailed Description

Calls a lua function back.

Definition at line 122 of file lua_callback.h.

void lubyk::LuaCallback::set_lua_callback ( lua_State *  L) [inline]

Set a callback. The top of the stack should be -2. userdata from lk.Thread / lk.Socket / mimas.Callback / etc -1. function()

Thanks to Robert G. Jakabosky for the idea to use lua_xmove instead of weak tables to store the function reference.
